document_data.name: Jakkob
document_data.mainbody: '''Jakkob''' was a [[werehyena]] inhabiting the city of [[Yhep]] along the [[Lake of Steam]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name=EotSS-p170">
document_data.Activities: Originally from [[Zakhara]], Jakkob was captured by [[Calishite]]s while he was in [[hyena]] form for a private menagerie. He was able to eventually escape and reached the [[Lake of Steam]] region where he became the leader of a pack of natural hyenas after slaying their alpha in combat. Jakkob led the pack on raids against the [[Talu-min]] tribe, killing many of their herd animals in the process. The Talu-min eventually caught up to, and slew all of the hyenas, but Jakkob was once again able to escape with his life. He fled to Yhep where he led the town's dog on nightly hunts.<ref name=EotSS-p170"/>
